description: Apple Watch Series 10 features the company's biggest display and thinnest design. It packs incremental upgrades under the hood. At a starting price of Rs. 46,900, the Series 10 is slightly costlier than the Series 9 at launch. Purely in terms of performance, the Series 10 offers a top-notch display and is a great companion for everyday workouts. Faster charging support is a boon, which makes it a solid smartwatch option. But is it worth your money? We answer that in this review.
title: Apple Watch Series 10 Review: Classic Reimagined

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024 sale has been going on for a few weeks now. The special discount sale kicked off on September 27 for all shoppers, after providing 24 hours of early access to Prime members. The sale is focused towards the Indian festive season and offers lucrative discounts on a wide range of products. Individuals can find offers on smartphones, laptops, tablets, earphones, smartwatches, smart TVs, and more.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival: Top Deals on Premium Smart TVs

description: As per a fresh update, Google has fully completed the integratigration of Ethereum Name Service (ENS) into Search. Nalin Basu, product manager for Web3 at Google, was the first to confirm the development on X, explaining its utility.
title: Google Search Now Supports Ethereum Name Service: Here’s What it Means

description: Google is now rolling out the new features announced for Google TV devices last week. Among them, the standout feature is the addition of custom artificial intelligence (AI) art screensavers. This feature allows users to turn their idle screen into a unique piece of art. Additionally, users can also use their images on Google Photos to make it a screensaver.
title: Google Is Rolling Out Custom AI Art Screensavers on Google TV Devices: How to Add

description: Oppo Find X8 series is scheduled to make its debut in China on October 24. The purported smartphone lineup is expected to feature a dedicated capture button for the camera, enabling quick access. Ahead of its anticipated launch, a company official has highlighted the reasons behind the inclusion of this new button on the Find X8 series and why it is different from the Camera Control button found on Apple’s new iPhone 16 series.
title: Oppo Official Reveals Reason Behind New Capture Button on the Find X8 Series

description: Poco C75 is speculated to make its global debut soon. Ahead of its anticipated launch, several specifications of the purported handset’s global variant have been leaked, according to a report. It may come with multiple RAM and in-built storage options. The report also suggests it may be introduced in black and three other colourways.
title: Poco C75 Global Variant May Come With up to 8GB of RAM, 256GB of Storage: Report

description: Follows a trio of childhood best friends who try to balance parenthood, individuality, and their friendship.
title: Raat Jawaan Hai Review: A Heart-Warming Show on Adult Friendships and First-Time Parents

description: Dubai is now identifying illegal crypto entities operating within its region. VARA released a statement on the situation this week, claiming that this move is aimed at strengthening its enforcement programme against law evaders. The authority, however, has not disclosed the names of the entities in question.
title: Crypto-Friendly Dubai Issues Cease-and-Desist Orders Against Seven Entities, Here’s Why

description: YouTube might be hiding the “skip button” that appears on its ad interface. Some users have reported that the skip button is entirely missing whereas others have found it appearing after the countdown duration has passed. The video-streaming giant has reportedly stated that the skip button is not being tampered with, however, the company is testing the reduction of elements on the ad interface to improve the viewing experience.
title: YouTube Reportedly Confirms Reducing Elements on the Ads as Users Claim ‘Skip Button’ Is Being Hidden

description: The Lava Agni 3 5G price in India starts at Rs 20,999 and goes up to Rs 24,999. The handset comes loaded with a curved AMOLED display at the front and a secondary display at the rear. The smartphone is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7300X processor and packs 8GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage. The smartphone features a triple-camera setup on the rear panel, while the front packs a 16-megapixel shooter. The device runs on Android 14 and features a 5,000mAh battery.
title: Lava Agni 3 5G First Impressions

description: Beats’ new Pill speaker comes after a really long gap. The last Beats Pill speaker was launched in select markets back in 2015 and India officially wasn’t one of them. Regardless, it’s here now, and there’s plenty of features that make the Beats Pill (2024) a solid choice for a portable speaker despite its premium positioning in a rather crowded segment.
title: Beats Pill Review: A Compact Speaker That’s Big on Sound

description: The Motorola Edge 50 Pro 5G and Motorola Edge 50 Fusion are available at a starting price of Rs 29,999 and Rs 21,999 during the festive sale. Both models offer some premium design language and come equipped with the latest hardware. In this comparison, we will talk in-depth about both the models and which one you should consider during this festive season.
title: Motorola Edge 50 Pro 5G vs Motorola Edge 50 Fusion: Which One is Better?

description: NASA astronaut Matthew Dominick captured a stunning timelapse of vibrant red and green auroras from aboard the Dragon Endeavor spacecraft. Filmed on October 8, the auroras were caused by solar activity interacting with Earth’s atmosphere. Dominick recorded the footage while docked at the International Space Station, giving viewers a unique perspective of the natural phenomenon. He shared that capturing the perfect shots took hours and was a collaborative effort with his team. The mesmerising visuals left viewers around the globe amazed by the spectacle, providing a rare glimpse of auroras from space.
title: NASA Astronaut Records Timelapse of Red and Green Auroras From Space

description: NASA's Hubble Space Telescope and the New Horizons spacecraft teamed up for a unique dual observation of Uranus, providing valuable insights into planetary atmospheres. Hubble captured high-resolution images, revealing atmospheric features, while New Horizons, 6.5 billion miles away, saw the planet as a small dot. This combined data helps researchers better understand how exoplanets might appear in future telescope observations. The findings, presented at the American Astronomical Society’s Division for Planetary Sciences meeting, are expected to inform future missions aimed at studying exoplanets and their atmospheres. These missions could lead to discoveries about distant worlds and their habitability.
title: NASA’s Hubble and New Horizons Collaborate for Uranus Observation, Shedding Light on Exoplanet Imaging

description: NOAA has issued a warning for a severe solar storm expected to hit Earth on October 10-11, 2024. This storm, classified as G4, is caused by a coronal mass ejection from the sun, travelling at nearly 2.9 million miles per hour. It has the potential to disrupt power grids, radio communications, and satellites. Additionally, the storm could enhance auroral displays, making them visible across the central and eastern United States, including the Midwest and Northern California. Forecasters advise monitoring updates and staying alert for potential impacts as the storm's effects unfold.
title: Severe Solar Storm Warning: NOAA Predicts Auroras Across US, Possible Power Grid Impact

description: New research shows that the brain organises daily experiences into segments, much like scenes in a movie. The study reveals that memory boundaries are not solely determined by external factors, but also by personal priorities and interpretations. The findings indicate that we have more control over how we perceive and recall experiences than previously thought, as brain activity shifts based on what we focus on. This research could provide insights into conditions like PTSD and dementia, where event segmentation is disrupted.
title: Study Reveals How Brain Divides Continuous Experiences into 'Movie Scenes'

description: The 2024 Nobel Prize in Chemistry has been awarded to David Baker for his work in computational protein design, and to Demis Hassabis and John M. Jumper for their AI model that predicts protein structures. These achievements advance our understanding of proteins, which are crucial for life. Their research could lead to innovations in pharmaceuticals, vaccines, and environmental solutions.
title: 2024 Nobel Prize in Chemistry Recognises Groundbreaking Protein Discoveries

description: Brazil's Finance Ministry says that local legislation needs to be equipped with more tools to address a new reality where big tech firms, due to their size and market power, inhibit competition.
title: Brazil Suggests Reform to Tighten Antitrust Regulation for Big Techs

description: Reliance Jio announced new International Subscriber Dialing (ISD) recharge plans for 21 countries on Friday. The telecom service provider introduced new minute packs that offer dedicated on-call minutes on every recharge. The new ISD recharge plans start at Rs. 39 and go up to Rs. 99. These plans are available for both prepaid and postpaid subscribers.
title: Reliance Jio Introduces New ISD Minute Pack Recharge Plans Starting at Rs. 39

description: Dyson WashG1 wet floor cleaner was launched in India on Thursday. Introduced as Dyson’s first dedicated cord-free mop, the WashG1 boasts features such as dual microfibre rollers, multiple hydration modes and self-cleaning functionality. During cleaning, the wet floor cleaner is claimed to have the ability to separate wet and dry debris at the source.
title: Dyson WashG1 Wet Floor Cleaner With Multiple Hydration Modes Launched: Specifications, Price in India

description: At an event in San Francisco, AMD CEO Lisa Su said the company plans to release its next-generation MI350 series chips in the second half of 2025. These chips include an increased amount of memory and will boast a new underlying architecture that AMD said will improve performance significantly over the prior MI300X and MI250X chips.
title: AMD Sees Next AI Chip in Mass Production Later This Year

description: Liner has raised $29 million (roughly Rs. 243 crore) from investors in a Series B round with investors including LB Investment, as well as existing backers Capstone Partners and SL Investment alongside Samsung.
title: Samsung Backs Scholarly AI Bot Serving Students and Academics

description: Tesla Cybercab electric vehicle (EV) was unveiled at the “We, Robot” event on Thursday. Introduced at the Warner Bros lot in Burbank, California as a competitor to the likes of Alphabet’s Waymo, the highly-anticipated robotaxi joins Tesla’s lineup of autonomous self-driving vehicles such as the Cybertruck, Model 3, and Model S.
title: Tesla Cybercab Autonomous Prototype EV With FSD System and No Steering Wheel Unveiled

description: Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 processor for the mobile platform debuted in India at the Snapdragon for India event in July as a budget-friendly 5G chipset. Now, Xiaomi will become the first original equipment manufacturer (OEM) to launch a handset with this new chipset, according to a report. The purported handset is touted as an entry-level offering and is expected to be unveiled in India next week at the India Mobile Congress (IMC) 2024.
title: Xiaomi Likely to Launch First Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 SoC-Powered Smartphone at Indian Mobile Congress 2024

description: OnePlus 13 was earlier rumoured to be launched in October, and a company executive confirmed on Wednesday that the handset will arrive later this month. This will be the China launch of the smartphone, and a global debut is expected sometime later this year. Alongside confirming the launch timeline, the executive also claimed that the OnePlus 13 will receive a “big leap” in performance.
title: OnePlus 13 Set to Launch This Month; Executive Tips ‘Big Leap’ in Performance

description: iQOO 13 is expected to launch in China in November as the company’s next flagship device. The latest development comes from the company itself. At the Vivo Developer Conference (VDC) 2024, it has been officially confirmed that the iQOO 13 will be equipped with the new BOE Q10 display developed with the latest technology, bringing improvements over previous-generation screens.
title: iQOO 13 to Feature New-Generation BOE Q10 Display With 2K Resolution

description: The JioFinance app was launched in India on Friday as a one-stop solution for financial essentials. It has been developed by Jio Financial Services Limited (JFSL), previously a subsidiary of Reliance Industries Limited. The app, which is now available widely for users in the country, offers facilities such as carrying out UPI transactions, monitoring and investing in mutual funds and making bill payments.
title: JioFinance App With UPI, Utility Payments and Loan Functionality Launched in India

description: Redmi Note 14 5G was launched in China last month, but now, it might be headed for a debut in the international markets. As per a report, the smartphone was spotted on the Indonesian certification portal, hinting that it could be released in the country. Additionally, it was also reported to have appeared on the certification websites in the US and Europe.
title: Redmi Note 14 5G Reportedly Spotted on Indonesian Certification Portal, Hints at Global Launch

description: The overall crypto market cap recorded a minor dip over the last 24 hours. Bitcoin registered a minor loss, whereas Ether saw a gain of under one percent. Cardano, Avalanche, and Shiba Inu registered losses, whereas Avalanche and Leo saw gains.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Slips Under $61,000 Owing to US’ CPI Data, Most Altcoins Retain Profits

description: After screenshots about theme support showed up a few months ago, support for themes is now finally making its way to the beta version of WhatsApp on Android. A recent report even revealed support for the same feature on iOS, so it seems that Android is not too far behind.
title: After iOS, WhatsApp Now Rolling Out Messenger-Like Chat-Specific Theme Support on Android

description: TikTok is laying off hundreds of employees from its global workforce, including a large number of staff in Malaysia, the company said on Friday. Two sources familiar with the matter earlier told Reuters that more than 700 jobs were slashed in Malaysia.
title: ByteDance's TikTok Cuts Hundreds of Jobs in Shift Towards AI Content Moderation

description: Bosch will collaborate with Tenstorrent to create a platform for standardising the building blocks of automotive chips. Hastened by the introduction of electric vehicles, autos have increasingly become products that resemble large computer systems that operate via a battery on four wheels.
title: Bosch, Tenstorrent to Collaborate on Standardising Automotive Chips
